thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com
thread.title: Tobias

author: Tobias
title: Tobias
text: I have to admit that I'm asking them a lot of questions and ask for help quite often. Of course there are thing where they say "we can't help you with that", but most of the time they are willing to "walk the extra mile". They search forums and provide me with links that might help me with my issue or even suggest me 3rd party modules. Long story shot: Great service.
